message: I'm so glad that he was able to walk his beautiful children down the aisle and renew his vows with his wonderful wife. My heart goes out to his loving family and all who knew and loved this special man. May he rest in peace.

If anything, evolution is evidence of a divine order. There really isn't any other way for it to have worked. Random chance is too random to have worked so well so quickly. People that truly understand science are some of the most certain of us that there is a God, a creator, an artificer. If the beauty of creating a world like ours over billions of years isn't more powerful to you than doing it in seven days, you need to reevaluate your perspective.

Trump doesn't like to be questioned regarding what he says. What he says doesn't hold up to scrutiny by rational people.

CAN RUSSIA HACK U.S. ELECTIONS? . Unlike Zimbabwe or some other corrupt African governments, the U.S. Federal Election Commission has conducted the Presidential election in a perfect, scientific and systematic manner without any corrupt practice. """"To be clear: The equipment that people vote on is NOT connected to the Internet,"""" the National Association of Secretaries of State wrote in an open letter to Congress. """"Vote counting is NEVER done with systems connected to the Internet, and tabulation systems are not networked."""" In sum, Russia has not hacked votes and therefore CIA is bluffing to fool the public. CIA AND OBAMA CIA chief Brennan is a Muslim. He opted to take the oath on a copy of the U.S. Constitution, not on the Bible as every past CIA director, Christian and Jewish, had done. Both Obama and Brennan were shocked by the unexpected victory of Trump and they have now planned to attribute Trump's victory to Russian hacking. The New York Times commented that ¡°in the 67 years since the C.I.A. was founded, few presidents have had as close a bond with their intelligence chiefs as Mr. Obama has forged with Mr. Brennan. So this hoax of Russian hacking is a planned strategy of Obama and Brennen to mislead the public about Trump¡¯s victory.
